smartPlanning.description: Automatically generate reasonable activity schedules based on party size and duration, ensuring the party rhythm is compact and interesting.

venueSetup.description: Provide professional setup plans for indoor and outdoor venues, including detailed guidance on decoration placement and space planning.

themes.description: From classic themes to creative themes, support custom theme design to meet personalized party needs.

atmosphere.title: Atmosphere Creation
atmosphere.description: Recommend suitable music, lighting and decorations according to party type to create the perfect birthday celebration atmosphere.

catering.title: Catering Pairing
catering.description: Provide birthday cake, snacks, drinks and other catering suggestions, formulate the best plan according to the number of people and budget.

services.subtitle: Services
services.title: Diverse Birthday Party Solutions
services.description: We provide professional birthday party planning services for different age groups, making every birthday a special memory.

children.title: Children's Birthday Party

adult.title: Adult Birthday Gathering

elderly.title: Elder's Birthday Celebration
elderly.description: Carefully planned birthday celebration activities for elders over 50, focusing on warm, comfortable, and meaningful celebration methods.

theme.title: Theme Party Planning
theme.description: Provide a variety of creative theme options, from retro nostalgia to modern fashion, meeting the needs of different age groups and preferences.

pricing.subtitle: Pricing Plans
pricing.title: Choose Your Perfect Party Planning Plan
pricing.description: From free trial to professional customization, make every birthday party creative and memorable

free.title: Free Plan
free.description: Try basic party planning features, perfect for occasional party hosts.

premium.title: Premium Plan
premium.description: Unlock all features for unlimited personalized party planning experience.

isFree.question: Is the birthday party planning tool free?
isFree.answer: Yes! We provide a free version for you to experience. The free version can generate 3 party plans per day, data is saved for 7 days, allowing you to fully understand our planning features. For more features, you can upgrade to the premium version.

allAges.question: Are the generated party plans suitable for all age groups?
allAges.answer: Absolutely! We have specially designed different party plans for children (3-12 years old), adults (18-50 years old), and elders (over 50 years old), ensuring that each age group gets the most suitable celebration suggestions.

customTheme.question: Can I customize party themes?
customTheme.answer: Yes! In addition to the 6 preset themes we provide, you can also enter custom themes. Our system will generate corresponding party planning plans based on your creative ideas.

saveExport.question: Can the generated plans be saved or exported?
saveExport.answer: Free version plan data is saved for 7 days, premium version supports permanent data storage and export functions. You can export complete party planning plans as PDF or other formats for easy execution and sharing.

planDifference.question: What's the difference between free and premium versions?
planDifference.answer: Free version can generate 3 plans per day, data saved for 7 days, provides simple planning plans. Premium version supports unlimited generation, permanent data storage, export functions, and provides more detailed customized plans, only $9.9/month.

planner.pageDescription: Get your exclusive birthday party creative plan in minutes and make every birthday an unforgettable memory
planner.stepGuide: Complete 6 steps on the left → View exclusive plan on the right

form.title: Create Your Exclusive Party Plan
form.subtitle: Tell us your needs, and we'll customize the perfect birthday party plan for you
form.generatingDesc: AI is customizing your exclusive plan based on your selections, please wait...

errors.incompleteForm: Please complete all selections before generating a plan
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred while generating the plan, please try again later

tips.budgetReminder: Budget references included in the plan, adjustable based on actual situation
tips.preparationAdvice: Recommend starting preparation 2-3 weeks in advance for best results
tips.weatherAdvice: Weather changes require backup plans, consider both indoor and outdoor venues

executionDetails.tipText: Highlight moments need host guidance, emotional engagement segments should control rhythm and avoid being overly sentimental.

evaluationLevels.excellent: 🎉 Congratulations! Your plan meets professional planner standards with complete execution feasibility and excellent user experience design.
evaluationLevels.good: 👍 Great! Your plan has good overall quality with room for improvement in details.
evaluationLevels.fair: ✅ Qualified! Basically meets party needs, suggest further optimization in creativity and execution details.
evaluationLevels.needsImprovement: ⚠️ Needs optimization! The plan requires improvements in multiple dimensions for better results.

emptyState.description: After completing the selection on the left, we will generate a personalized birthday party planning plan for you

testimonials.subtitle: User Reviews
testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Over 1000+ families have successfully planned unforgettable birthday parties using our tool

zhang.name: Zhang Xiaoyu
zhang.comment: Amazing! Used this tool to plan my daughter's 6th birthday party. The princess theme suggestions were very detailed, and the kids had a great time. The activity arrangement was reasonable and well-timed.

li.name: Mr. Li
li.comment: Used this tool to plan my wife's 30th birthday. The retro theme plan was very creative. The catering and music suggestions were excellent, and friends said it was the best birthday party they've ever attended!

wang.name: Mrs. Wang
wang.comment: Used it for my husband's 70th birthday. The garden theme plan was particularly warm. The tea party format was perfect for our age, and the decoration suggestions were practical with great results at low cost.

chen.name: Mrs. Chen
chen.comment: Used this tool for my child's birthday party for two consecutive years, from superhero to ocean adventure themes. Each time was a surprise. Budget control was excellent, and my child loved it.

liu.name: Manager Liu
liu.comment: Used the modern minimalist theme for our company annual meeting. Although not a traditional birthday party, this tool's creativity made our event stand out, and colleagues responded very well.

mei.name: Xiao Mei
mei.comment: Planned my roommate's 21st birthday with the music party theme - it was awesome! The DJ music and neon lighting suggestions turned our dorm into a mini nightclub. So much fun!
